title: SF_ESPE (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SF_ESPE
This function block is a safety-related function block for monitoring electro-sensitive protective equipment (ESPE).

rows:
Safety demand input. FALSE: ESPE actuated, demand for
safety-related response. TRUE: ESPE not actuated, no demand
for safety-related response.
Behaviour on error of safety FB

rows.Name: Ready
rows.Comment:
Activation of the FB. TRUE indicates that the FB is
activated and the outputs results are valid, FALSE the FB is
not active and the program is not executed.

rows:
Output for the safety-related response. FALSE: Safety output
disabled. Demand for safety-related response (e.g., reset
required or internal errors active). TRUE: Safety output
enabled. No demand for safety-related re-sponse

Output indicating that the FB is active and the primary
safety function is demanded (e.g. related to the safety
functionality).

Output which can be used to signal the operator to press the
reset functionality to continue.
